name: Squarator 2: Friend Of Sight
description:
This game is Squarator 2. In this game, your name is Yellow Ball, and you have to beat 9 levels to save your brother Blue Ball. This includes 2 boss fights. "Oh, this platformer is impossible. How do I make that jump?", you might ask. Well say hello to your good friend Square. In this quest, Square will be used as a free platform which you can move around to get to different platforming sections. You will need to take advantage of him.

Controls:

UP / W: Jump

LEFT / A: Move Left

RIGHT / D: Move Right

MouseLeft: Move Square

SPACE: Shoot Bullets

C: Fix Collision Detection

T: Admin Commands (Admin ONLY)

0: Codes
